segments.title: Approach
segments.narration: Vehicle approaches the checkpoint. System begins detection and initializes tracking.

segments.title: OCR window
segments.narration: Plate visible. Best-frame selection, OCR candidates, validation rules, and voting determine final plate.

segments.title: Passing gate
segments.narration: Vehicle passes the gate. De-duplication checks performed; upload payload prepared.

segments.title: Cleared
segments.narration: Vehicle clears checkpoint. Event appears in dashboard with evidence and trace logs.
